title: Inquiry-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Inclusive Early Childhood STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A case-based, practice-oriented course for working teachers, focusing on designing inclusive STEM lessons for young children.

learning_goals: Learners can apply an inquiry-based STEM activity design framework for young children at various developmental stages.
Learners can construct multimodal learning environments using physical/digital tools (e.g., recycled materials, coding robots).
Learners can develop flexible instructional strategies tailored to individual needs and validate them with formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
